document_data.name: Fane-Eater
document_data.Powers: This battleaxe inflicted terrible damage to a target. When struck, a targeted creature suffered from necrotic damage. At the same time, the bearer of the weapon absorbed some of the life-force of the targeted creature.
document_data.History: As of the late 15th century [[DR]], ''Fane-Eater'' was in the possession of the [[dragonborn]] [[paladin]] [[Arkhan|Arkhan the Cruel]].
